channel.title: Random items
channel.description:
Does anyone know how i can make a item give random items? example of what i mean if you didn't understand what im meaning quite right. How do i make the item id 6542 ( also a present ) to give random items? Don't say i have to go google i already tried and didn't find anything really well why would anyone tut that when its basically knowledge. But however, i'm new at runescape private server coding. would be gladful if anyone answered the Question.
Thanks.

item.title: Random items
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

I’m giving you an example, not spoon feeding you. Read the code comments and figure it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Random items
item.dc:creator: @fifififi fifififi
item.description:
@fifififi wrote:

I know im retarded but where do i add it?

Read full topic

item.title: Random items
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

NoNoNo. 

    /**
     * In this multi-dimensional array you're going
     * to add all the 'random' items you want the users'
     * to receive when then open it. You can make another method
     * that will determine how they get the box, like from a drop or something.
     */
    private final int[][] RANDOM = { 
	{ },
	{ }
    };
    
    /**
     * This is the method that will be called when you click the box.
     * 
     * like so,
     * <code>
     * if (itemID == boxID) {
     *     openBox();
     * }
     * </code>
     */
    public void openBox() {
	for (int[] element : RANDOM) {
	    /*
	     * Here you're going to call your 'addItemsToInventory'
	     * method to add the random items into the inventory.
	     */
	}
    }

Read the code comments.

Read full topic

item.title: Random items
item.dc:creator: @StubernSnake StubernSnake
item.description:
@StubernSnake wrote:

[quote=“fifififi, post:9, topic:431571”][quote author=StubernSnake link=topic=534249.msg3905966#msg3905966 date=1328230130]
^
Client sided
Put this in Itemdef_2.java Or Itemdef.java
Under

Paste this.

if (i == 6542) { itemDef.name = "A Present"; itemDef.actions[1] = "Open"; itemDef.description = "I wonder what's inside.."; }
[/quote]

But how do i make it open random items?[/quote]
L2Search :FP: Server sided : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=472296.0

Read full topic

item.description:
@fifififi wrote:

[code] private final int[][] RANDOM = {
{ 6542, the random ids here or? },
{ 6542, “.” }
};

public void openBox() {
    for (int[] element : RANDOM) {
        // Open box, add items.
    }
}[/code]

so like this?

item.title: Random items
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

    private final int[][] RANDOM = { 
	{ itemID, Amount },
	{ itemID, Amount }
    };
    
    public void openBox() {
	for (int[] element : RANDOM) {
            // Open box, add items.
	}
    }

Example.

item.title: Random items
item.dc:creator: @fifififi fifififi
item.description:
@fifififi wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:4, topic:431571”]In your ClickItem Packet you would need to add something along the lines of,

if (itemID == ####) {
    // When clicked, give items.
}

Note, that won’t work.[/quote]
